There were no other sightings in Bridgend on or around August 11th 2013
divs: Sighting Detailsmy wife brother in law and sister in law had been to my sister in laws 60th birthday party in her daughters house we left the party at 12 30AM to go home as my wife and I live in the Rhondda valley approx. 15 miles from Brigend where the sighting took place so we slept over in Brigend that night my brother in law and I went to bed this was now 1 10am my wife who is a smoker went to have a cigarete before coming to bed out in the back garden while she was out there something caught her eye she called my sister in law to come and have a look when she seen the lights as well she came upstairs to call me and her huband I came down to look as well it was amazing there was intermitant clouds and we could see these blue and green lights through the clouds but not in the clear sky so when the light moved to my right it went invisible then when it went behind the next cloud and appeared again it done this about five or six times the time now was 1 50am at this time I was starting to get cold so I went back to bed but I cant get it out of my head.
Summary: c ould be seen through clouds but not in clear sky
